title: About me
text: I am a third year Ph.D. student in Statistical Data Analysis at Ghent University, advised by Prof. Dr. Stijn Vansteelandt (Ghent University) and Prof. Dr. Christophe Ley (University of Luxembourg).

title: About me
text:

BSc in Mathematics, Ghent University, Belgium | Sept 2017 - June 2020

title: Georgi Baklicharov
text: I am a fourth-year Ph.D. student in Statistical Data Analysis at Ghent University under the supervision of Prof. Dr. Stijn Vansteelandt (Ghent University) and Prof. Dr. Christophe Ley (University of Luxembourg). My research lies at the intersection of causal inference and debiased machine learning. If you want to get in touch, please don’t hesitate to contact me.
